pageTitle: Vietnam Tour of Duty Photographs from Ray Kelley
pageIntro:
A collection of photographs from Ray Kelley (Delta Company, 1st Battalion, 3rd Marines) taken during his tour of duty in the Vietnam War.

Photographs © 1967-2019 Raymond Kelley; published with permission as compliments to The Cage, an in-progress book project.

photos.subtitle: Delta Company, 1/3 Marines
photos.content: From Left to Right: Marty Cavazos, Bob LeBarge, Ron Marinucci, Bob Gallo, Dennis Mannion

photos.subtitle: PFC Don Ray Hollingsworth
photos.content:
Casualty was on May 4, 1967 during Operation Beaver Cage.
